translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その為なら、なんでもする覚悟だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm prepared to do anything for that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この目玉……珍しくのろけやがった……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Let's get back to the main topic.’
‘So, what are you trying to say?’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一騎打ちで俺と模擬戦をしてくれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Have a one-on-one practice duel with me.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうか……無理強いは良くないな。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘It's about what happens after I die.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺はこの戦いに死力を尽くすつもりだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘I intend to give my all in this battle.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺自身どうなるか分からん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘I don't know what will become of me.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺の嫁達、後をお前に頼みたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘I want to entrust my wives to you afterward.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「嫁達もお前には懐いている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘The wives are fond of you too.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時のことでいい、支えてやって欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Just for a little while, I want you to support them.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自分で守れる自信もない癖に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Despite not having confidence to protect them yourself,’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まして、死んだ後を他の男に頼むな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Moreover, don’t entrust them to another man after you die.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前のおさがりなんぞいらんわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘I don’t want anything handed down from you!’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正面から惚れさせて奪う気なんだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘make them fall for me directly and take them!’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くれてやるみたいに言うな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Don’t talk like you’re just giving them away!’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なに、あくまでも、もしもの話。
後顧の憂いを断ちたかっただけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘I just wanted to eliminate any worries behind me.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺には待つ者がいる。約束もある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘I have someone waiting for me. There’s also a promise.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡単に死ぬ気はないさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘I have no intention of dying easily.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、本当に死んだらその時はもらう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘No, if I do really die, then you can have them.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから出来るだけ早く死ね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘So hurry up and die as soon as possible.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そもそもやるとは言ってない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘...I never said I would do that in the first place.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 支えて欲しかっただけだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘I just wanted you to support them.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が死ねば俺が奪うから何も変わらんわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘If you die, I'll take them, so nothing will change!’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あげるって言われるのは癪だが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ‘Being told I’d get them is annoying, but’
‘I have no problem taking them by force.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おう、せいぜい俺の為に頑張れ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
